Table 1. GCN [8] segmentation results using given feature levels. Performances are 
evaluated by standard mean IoU(%) on PASCAL VOC 2012 validation set. Lower 
feature level involves less semantic but higher-resolution features and vice versa (see 
Fig 2). The feature extractor is based on pretrained ResNet50 [14] and ResNeXt101[18]  model. Performance is evaluated in mIoU.
